name: overdramatic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
showing much stronger emotions than are necessary or usual for a situation : When I say she saved my life, I am not being overdramatic. My parents say I was an over-dramatic teenager.
More examplesFewer examplesAt the risk of sounding overdramatic, I remember sobbing as I read the report.He heaved an overdramatic sigh and put down his book.Officials said the claim was over-dramatic.You're being a bit overdramatic.He gave her a withering look that was so overdramatic everyone burst out laughing.It's a little over-dramatic to say she was "devastated", but she was a bit upset.
